name: WipedOff
description:
WipedOff is a 3D Platformer that is currently in development. The demo version is out now to play. It is a solo developed indie game. This game will be known for its colorful visuals and random physics. Also a huge platform based world will be build and already in the demo itself there are some cool mechanics.

Game Story Prologue :

 Our protaganist is one who hates cubes but got struck in a dream of 3d platform world which is filled with cubes. He is given with a gun to smash those cubes , inorder to get out of the dream he has to find the eight letters that comes in the word WIPEDOFF in correct sequential order in that world.   

Come Join the demo and become a play tester and give your feedbacks and bugs therefore you can become a part of the game

Follow our profile to know the release of the full game and to experience the next gen games

beatfiregames.itch.io
